name: Boiling Frog
description:
# Boiling Frog

Don't Boil The Frog! Use WASD / ZQSD / Arrows to help your little frog hop to puddles to cool down. If Kero-Kero's temperature reaches 100, GAME OVER!

This is a remake of an old game jam game of mine "Puddle Splash" but updated with experience.

Assets from Kenney
